meanings.definition: Given or done for free; without charge.
meanings.sent1: The store offered gratis samples of their new product.
meanings.sent2: The event provided gratis admission to all attendees.
meanings.sent3: She was thrilled to receive gratis tickets to the concert.
meanings.sent4: The company's gratis services were like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The concept of gratis healthcare for all was revolutionary.

meanings.sent1: The hotel offered gratis breakfast to all guests.
meanings.sent2: The airline provided gratis snacks during the flight.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't believe his luck when he received gratis upgrades.
meanings.sent4: The gratis gift with purchase was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent5: The idea of gratis shipping made online shopping even more appealing.
